Name: Pruneaux
Ingredients: 30 ml Lustau Amontillado Los Arcos Sherry
15 ml Lustau San Emilio Pedro Ximénez Sherry
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: Sherried prunes further fortified by gin.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Pruneaux contains 183 calories
